plot: Mametchi and his friends must save Tamagotchi world from a book that is beginning to destroy reality, entitled "The World's Happiest Story".
title: Eiga! Tamagotchi: Uchû ichi happy na monogatari!?
plot_es: Mametchi and his friends must save Tamagotchi world from a book that is beginning to destroy reality, entitled "The World's Happiest Story".
original_name: Eiga! Tamagotchi: Uchû ichi happy na monogatari!?
